\begin{document}

I added prefixes of T to the tone labels in the hash table using the following:

\begin{verbatim}
awk -F '\t' -v OFS='\t' '{$4="T"$4} {$5="T"$5} {print}' 20111213-1-kiy-ap-framedwordlist.txt > 20111213-1-kiy-ap-framedwordlist-new.txt 
\end{verbatim}
